路.definition: road (CL:條|条[tiao2]); journey; route; line (bus etc); sort; kind

路上.definition: on the road; on the way; en route

路不拾遺.definition: lit. no one picks up lost articles in the street (idiom); fig. honesty prevails throughout society

路人甲.definition: ordinary person A; generic person; some random person

路人皆知.definition: understood by everyone (idiom); well known; a household name

路北區.definition: Lubei district of Tangshan city 唐山市[Tang2 shan1 shi4], Hebei

路南區.definition: Lunan district of Tangshan city 唐山市[Tang2 shan1 shi4], Hebei

路南彝族自治縣.pinyin: lù nán yí zú zì zhì xiàn
路南彝族自治縣.definition: Lunan Yizu Autonomous County in Yunnan

路塹.definition: (civil engineering) cutting (for a railway or highway)

路徑.definition: path; route; method; ways and means

路德.definition: Luther (name); Martin Luther (1483-1546), reformation protestant minister

路德維希港.definition: Ludwigshafen am Rhein, German city on the Rhine opposite Mannheim

路德雀鶥.definition: (bird species of China) brown-throated fulvetta; Ludlow's fulvetta (Fulvetta ludlowi)

路數.definition: stratagem; method; approach; (martial arts) movement; social connections; (sb's) background story

路易斯·伊納西奧·盧拉·達席爾瓦.pinyin: lù yì sī · yī nà xī ào · lú lā · dá xí ěr wǎ
路易斯·伊納西奧·盧拉·達席爾瓦.definition: Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, the thirty-fifth president of Brazil; Lula

路易斯安那州.pinyin: lù yì sī ān nà zhōu

路橋區.definition: Luqiao district of Taizhou city 台州市[Tai1 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang

路段.definition: stretch of road; section of a highway or railway

路氹.definition: Cotai, portmanteau term referring to the islands of 路環|路环[Lu4 huan2] (Coloane) and 氹仔[Dang4 zai3] (Taipa) in Macau; the strip of reclaimed land between Coloane and Taipa; the island formed by Coloane, Taipa and the reclaimed land between them

路況.definition: road condition(s) (e.g. surface, traffic flow etc)

路演.definition: road show or promotional tour (for a product etc)

路牌.definition: street sign; road sign; street nameplate

路痴.definition: person with a poor sense of direction

路程.definition: route; path traveled; distance traveled; course (of development)

路線.definition: itinerary; route; political line (e.g. right revisionist road); CL:條|条[tiao2]

路衝.definition: (feng shui) street layout in which the line of a road runs toward a house (as at a T-intersection), regarded as unfavorable for the occupants of the house

路西弗.definition: Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)

路西法.definition: Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)

路見不平，拔刀相助.pinyin: lù jiàn bù píng ， bá dāo xiāng zhù
路見不平，拔刀相助.definition: lit. to intervene when one sees an injustice (idiom); fig. to rush to the rescue; to play the white knight

路費.definition: travel expenses; money for a voyage; toll

路轉粉.definition: (Internet slang) to go from being indifferent to being a big fan

路透金融詞典.pinyin: lù tòu jīn róng cí diǎn

路途遙遠.definition: it's a very long journey to get there

路遇.definition: to meet (sb) by chance on the way somewhere; to encounter (sth) on the way somewhere

路遙知馬力，日久見人心.pinyin: lù yáo zhī mǎ lì ， rì jiǔ jiàn rén xīn
路遙知馬力，日久見人心.definition: just as distance determines the stamina of a horse, so does time reveal a person's true heart (proverb)

路霸.definition: brigand; (modern) uncivil driver; road hog; (PRC) person who sets up an illegal toll; (Tw) person who uses a part of the street as their private parking place
